xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields ### Missing: Menu.MenuClass_content1=Menu Structure
# Live table generic keys ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.title=Page title menu.livetable.doc.name=Nome da página ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.space=Space ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name menu.livetable.doc.author=Último Autor ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.creator=Creator menu.livetable.doc.date=Data de atualização ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date ### Missing: menu.livetable._avatar=Avatar ### Missing: menu.livetable._images=Images ### Missing: menu.livetable._attachments=Attachments ### Missing: menu.livetable._actions=Actions ### Missing: menu.livetable._actions.edit=Edit ### Missing: menu.livetable._actions.delete=Delete ### Missing: menu.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys ### Missing: menu.livetable.content1=Menu Structure
# UIX keys ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.label=Menu Display Location ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.hint=Specifies where to display the menu. The menu is displayed either horizontally or vertically, based on the chosen location. ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.nowhere=Nowhere ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.template.header.after=After the Page Header ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.rightPanels=Inside a Right Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.leftPanels=Inside a Left Panel ### Missing: menu.uix.content.label=UI Extension Content ### Missing: menu.uix.content.hint=If you can see this then it probably means you have JavaScript disabled. You should select the same value as for the menu display location. ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.label=Menu Visibility Scope ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.hint=Specifies in which context the menu is visible.
